name: Whisper's Home
description: The final destination. Whisper must return here with the peaches she collected to complete her journey.

travel_descriptions.east: Leaving the familiarity of Whisper's Home behind, you step confidently towards the east, beginning your ascent from the base of the mountain, embarking on an exciting journey of adventure.
travel_descriptions.west: Leaving the safety of Whisper's Home, you stride purposefully towards the west, gradually entering into the enigmatic realm of the Forest Clearing, ready to tackle the riddle that awaits.
travel_descriptions.north: Leaving the comforting confines of Whisper's Home, you journey towards the north, guided by your mission to secure the peaches. Gradually, you find yourself in the heart of the Peach Tree Grove, dodging aggressive birds as you search for the prized peach tree.
